example.name: useless power :)
example.text: A group of 27 Senators has written Mr. Kemp urging him to reject Cranston - Mitchell and focus on programs that *trace* empower the poor rather than create vast new government obligations .

example.name: with use
example.text: It also empowers the president to make recess appointments , without Senate approval : `` The President shall have Power to fill up all Vacancies that may happen during the Recess of the Senate , by granting Commissions which shall expire at the End of their next Session . ''
example.arg: to make recess appointments , without Senate approval
